data.title: List of The Penguins of Madagascar episodes
data.meta_description: This is a list of episodes for Nickelodeon's animated television series, The Penguins of Madagascar. As of December 19, 2015, 149 original episodes have aired, with most of the episodes to date being aired in pairs. Aside from eight double-length specials and one quadruple-length special, the...
